nodes.text: The Cauldron Nebula was a nebula located within the Corva sector in the Outer Rim Territories. Consisting of seven supergiant blue stars, the nebula was home to the Eol Sha system, where a colony was set up in preparation for a mining operation intended to harvest valuable gases from the nebula through the use of ramjet mining ships.

During his personal vendetta against Imperial Admiral Natasi Daala in 11 ABY, renegade Jedi apprentice Kyp Durron used the Sun Crusher superweapon to ignite the nebula's seven stars in hopes of destroying Daala and the tattered remains of her fleet. As a consequence, the Cauldron Nebula was destroyed when its stars all went supernova.
Nebula orchids were named after it.
In the book Champions of the Force, the Cauldron Nebula is mistakenly said to have had only five blue supergiants rather than seven.
